Text:
Downloaded, Installed, entered serial, working. Though not with every DVD. With new ones it's not working.
But when i try to open it next time it shows me the windows with Windows message and some bs there, like it cannot be opened or something. So i have to reinstall every time when i need this program. That is very weird.
I'm able to rip a DVD just fine, but I can't figure out how to get it to keep the video dimensions of the DVD, it keeps shrinking it down really really small. Any tips?
